title: fix ups riot?
body: Hey The team at Riot, just wanted to point out that you guys still haven't updated some of your tips for champions, a prime example ( and where i first caught on to it) is Vladimir. His counter tips say  "items that counter health stacking, such as Deathfire Grasp. Now; we all know that you guys removed the item from the game (RIP DFG) so for clarity purposes i was just wonder if you guys could possibly touch up on it before next patch. other than that keep up the good work :)

replies.body: lol riot needs a fucking fix up ahahaha. my shit is a better game then this lol
